StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_ViewBackupFailuresNew]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ServerName varchar(25), @NumDaysBack smallint
AS
declare @sql varchar(3500)
--set ansi_nulls on --set ansi_Warnings on set quoted_iden..er o.
--set @ServerName='rcmcriss04a' --set @NumDaysBack='30'
set @sql = "select a.job_id, run_date," set @sql = @sql + " run_.me = case " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me))=1" set @sql = @sql + " then '00000'+ convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me))=2" set @sql = @sql + " then '0000'+ convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me))=3" set @sql = @sql + " then '000'+ convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me))=4" set @sql = @sql + " then '00'+ convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me))=5" set @sql = @sql + " then '0'+ convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me) " set @sql = @sql + " else convert(varchar(6),a.run_.me)" set @sql = @sql + " end," set @sql = @sql + " run_dura.on = case " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on))=1" set @sql = @sql + " then '00000'+ convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on))=2" set @sql = @sql + " then '0000'+ convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on))=3" set @sql = @sql + " then '000'+ convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on))=4" set @sql = @sql + " then '00'+ convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on))=5" set @sql = @sql + " then '0'+ convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on) " set @sql = @sql + " else convert(varchar(6),run_dura.on)" set @sql = @sql + " end," set @sql = @sql + " b.name," set @sql = @sql + " next_run_.me = case " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me))=1" set @sql = @sql + " then '00000'+ convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me))=2" set @sql = @sql + " then '0000'+ convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me))=3" set @sql = @sql + " then '000'+ convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me))=4" set @sql = @sql + " then '00'+ convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me) " set @sql = @sql + " when len(convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me))=5" set @sql = @sql + " then '0'+ convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me) " set @sql = @sql + " else convert(varchar(6),c.next_run_.me)" set @sql = @sql + " end," set @sql = @sql + " 'Failed' as run_status " set @sql = @sql + " from " + @ServerName + ".msdb.dbo.sysjobhistory a, " + @ServerName + ".msdb.dbo.sysjobs b, " + @ServerName + ".msdb.dbo.sysjobschedules c " set @sql = @sql + "where a.job_id=b.job_id" set @sql = @sql + " and b.job_id=c.job_id" set @sql = @sql + " and a.run_status = 0" set @sql = @sql + " and b.name like '%DB Maintenance Plan%'" --set @sql = @sql + " and b.descrip.on like 'Database Backup%'" set @sql = @sql + " and a.step_id='0'" set @sql = @sql + " and convert(smalldate.me,convert(varchar(8),a.run_date),112)" set @sql = @sql + " between convert(smalldate.me,getdate()-" + convert(varchar(2),@NumDaysBack) + ",112) and convert(smalldate.me,getdate(),112)" /*--set @sql = @sql + " or " set @sql = @sql + "a.job_id=b.job_id" set @sql = @sql + " and b.job_id=c.job_id" set @sql = @sql + " and a.run_status = 0" set @sql = @sql + " and b.name like 'Transac.on Log%'" set @sql = @sql + " and a.step_id='0'" set @sql = @sql + " and convert(smalldate.me,convert(varchar(8),a.run_date),112)" set @sql = @sql + " between convert(smalldate.me,getdate()-" + convert(varchar(2),@NumDaysBack) + ",112) and convert(smalldate.me,getdate(),112)" */ set @sql = @sql + " order by run_date desc"
--print @sql execute(@sql)
